inclusion.criterion: Documentation of ongoing diarrhea at time of recruitment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No antibiotic use within the last 90 days
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe comorbid condition (at discretion of the principal investigator)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: On immunosuppressive medications (high dose steroids 30 mg/kg of methylprednisolone)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
